content.description: Sit start. A steep overhang with 3 small pockets. Very pumpy climb to the arête.
Sit start and traverse up and to the right. Too much dirt and overgrowth to top out.

Best route with great variety in a short climb, kneebar, pocket, pinch. Much better than beware of trolls. Start on obvious pinch, right and below Beware of Trolls finish. Make hard moves up to gain lip. Finish same as beware of trolls or traverse a little left and mantle over lip (see video in unnamed project v7/8).
content.location: Below and right of Beware of Trolls finish.

content.description: Start on the left-bottom corner of the underhang on the smooth wall. Work your way to a double 2-finger pocket on top of the underhang. Do a tarzan swing and throw a heel.
content.protection: Bring a crash pad or two because you can easily flip.

content.description: Follow the crack and inset to the left of ___. Start with a finger crack in the center and move up and left to the horn and the top ledge. The top of the the crack you start in is all choss, so move out of it left towards the top. Definitely a High Ball problem and the top isn't that good so it leads to a sketchy mantle.
content.protection: As many mats as you can find.

content.description: Start on the same holds for Sunny Day Rain. Left undercling. Get your feet high and left. Move left and up to the left between the cave and the large crack. Top out without chossing your entire chest.
content.location: In between The cave and Sunny Day Rain.

content.description: Sit start into a drop knee to the first hold. For an easier variation start with hands spread out and bump your right hand into the 3-finger pocket. Climb directly up and traverse right to the horn.
content.protection: Have a good spotter as to avoid falling/rolling onto the short rock-wall behind the landing zone.

content.description: Sart on Beware of Trolls and traverse to the right end on Calm Before the Storm. The lower you stay the harder it is.
content.location: Same wall as Calm Before the Storm and Beware of Trolls.

content.description: Start on the far left of the wall, and traverse right staying as low as possible the whole way until you can step off on the block. if you go higher through the crux sections it's much easier!
content.location: The main wall, take a right after the road curves left past a rock that says beware of Trolls. From there's its in view on your left( Generally theres chalk on it).

content.description: Starts about halfway down the left wall. Start on the wavy rocks with a good slopper and a fantastic three finger pocket (shorter people can foot jam and push up to the pocket). Move up and left to the corner with good feet and then move back right to a small horn.
content.protection: The top can be chossy. Great spotter and pads as its a sketch fall from the top

content.description: left to right traverse. sit start,  2 hands around the arete, then high left hand reach to small finger pocket. nice knee bar to move and and right of the arete. move across the off width and into under cling (good spot to chalk up) crux move in the middle and finish on the rock pillar to the far right. (stay pretty low)

sit start two hands on lower arete, reach high right for little left pocket, then move right across the off-width and into an under cling. clux move in the middle finish on far right to the end of the rock. (stay pretty low)
On the right side of the two opposing walls
content.protection: Stick Shoes. Pretty much a ladder just don't fall because it would be a rough tumble.

content.description: Sit start, do some awkward moves along the left arete to the right arete and do a couple tough moves to turn the corner and gain the top. Stand start: V3(much better) Might need to clean the last hold as it was covered in foliage when I was there.
